title: Whispers from the Void
goal: Lyra learns Vane's ultimate goal while in captivity.
stakes_shift: The 'beast' is actually a mirror of humanity.

scenes.summary: Vane treats Lyra with strange respect, showing her his 'collection' of star-shards.
scenes.outcome: Lyra realizes Vane isn't just power-hungry; he's terrified of the dark.

scenes.summary: Vane explains that the stars are dying because they are lonely, and he will give them a voice.
scenes.outcome: Vane's plan is to merge all human consciousness into the star-web.

scenes.summary: Lyra is left alone and hears the 'stars' whispering to her.
scenes.outcome: The whispers are the screams of those already consumed.

scenes.summary: Lyra uses a hidden piece of tech to send a signal to Kaelen.
scenes.outcome: The signal is weak but enough to guide him.

scenes.summary: A guard enters to feed her, and Lyra notices a flaw in the void-cell's shielding.
scenes.outcome: She has a plan to escape.

scenes.summary: Vane enters and tells her they have arrived at the Rift.
scenes.outcome: The time for talk is over.
